description:
There are some typos .

adress => address (in nova/virt/libvirt/volume/volume.py)
curent => current (in nova/virt/hyperv/hostops.py)
concurent => concurrent (in nova/tests/unit/compute/test_compute_api.py)
title: Typos of 'address', 'current' and 'concurrent'

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/208749
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=e5f457d66f53281770c0e151b616ca55724676bb
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit e5f457d66f53281770c0e151b616ca55724676bb
Author: Takashi NATSUME <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Aug 4 09:58:45 2015 +0900

    Fix a few typos
    
    adress => address
    curent => current
    concurent => concurrent
    a instance => an instance
    optinally => optionally
    
    Change-Id: I08e38d8418c2133475e4631bfaef17e34dd1c5bc
    Closes-Bug: #1481123
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This is not worthy of a bug report in my opinion.  The only time I'd expect maybe a bug for a typo issue is if they are user-facing strings or translated (like logging > DEBUG).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem
